pengu.messenger

Class PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey
  • Enclosing class:
    PenguMessengerRESTClient

    public static class PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for a public key object to be created to link a public key String to a username, expiry date and registration date.
